house_listing.house_description: Fantastic remolded home for a family.2 bedrooms & 1 bath plus a bonus room. Good size lot backyard and front yard,zoning is r-4,however property shows excellent.Bring offers!Move in condition home and owner are motivated tosell.Call listing agent for more info-emily santos
